name: Shape tower
description:
Concept

This is the start of an idea I got of a game where we would need to make towers with shapes and do so that they stay up for something like 3 or 5 secondes and if you are capable to do this you go the next level.

Controls

Drag the shapes with your mouse.

Left arrow/ Right arrow: rotate shape

R: reset the level

If you install the game you can also press escape to quit the game. But if you do this on the web version it will freeze so if you press escape on the web version you should reload the page.

Thanks for playing!
